com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.search.linear

Class LinearSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.search.Search
      • com.mijecu25.dsa.algorithms.search.linear.LinearSearch

  • public final class LinearSearch
extends Search
    Search algorithm that linearly searches for an element in an collection. All methods return the index where the elements was found in the collection.

    Runtime: O(n)
    Version:
    0.1.3.8
    Author:
    Miguel Velez - miguelvelezmj25

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public static <E> int search(E[] array,
                             E value)
        Search for the value in the array and return the index of the first occurrence from the beginning of the array.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this array.
        Parameters:
        array - - array that we are searching in.
        value - - value that is being searched in the array.
        Returns:
        the index where the value is found in the array, else -1.

      • search

        public static <E> int search(List<E> list,
                             E value)
        Search for the value in the list and return the index of the first occurrence from the beginning of the list. The run time of this algorithm depends on the implementation of the list. It is advised to use an array based implementation to achieve O(n) runtime.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this list.
        Parameters:
        list - - list that we are searching in.
        value - - value that is being searched in the list.
        Returns:
        the index where the value is found in the list, else -1.

      • search

        public static <E> int search(E[] array,
                             E value,
                             int occurrence)
        Search for the value in the array and return the index of the specified occurrence from the beginning of the array.
        Type Parameters:
        E - - the type of elements in this array.
        Parameters:
        array - - array that we are searching in.
        value - - value that is being searched in the array.
        occurrence - - number of times we have seen the value before returning the index.
        Returns:
        the index where the value is found in the array, else -1.

        byteArray - - array that we are searching in.
        value - - value that is being searched in the array.
        occurrence - - number of times we have seen the value before returning the index.
        Returns:
        the index where the value is found in the array, else -1.

      • searchLast

                             short value,

        value - - value that is being searched in the array.
